## EcdsaKey class

EcdsaKey defines the public/private key-pairs used to interact with Tupelo. It also supportes generating new keys either randomly or through a passphrase.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EcdsaKey 
```

|  [generate](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ecdsakey.generate.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>() =&gt; Promise&lt;EcdsaKey&gt;</code> | Generate a new keypair with random bits. |
|  [passPhraseKey](./tupelo-wasm-sdk.ecdsakey.passphrasekey.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>(phrase: Uint8Array, salt: Uint8Array) =&gt; Promise&lt;EcdsaKey&gt;</code> | Generate a new key based on a passphrase and salt (this goes through the Warp wallet treatment [https://keybase.io/warp/warp\_1.0.9\_SHA256\_a2067491ab582bde779f4505055807c2479354633a2216b22cf1e92d1a6e4a87.html](https://keybase.io/warp/warp_1.0.9_SHA256_a2067491ab582bde779f4505055807c2479354633a2216b22cf1e92d1a6e4a87.html)<!-- -->) |
